# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) and a burner inserter at position (x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure.

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) and a pipe group at position (x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have sufficient fuel before use.
- Check the status of burner entities to ensure they are not waiting for source items.

### Errors when using offshore pump and boiler entities
- Ensure that offshore pump and boiler entities are properly connected to the steam engine.
- Check the status of offshore pump and boiler entities to ensure they are working correctly.

### Errors when using electricity group entities
- Ensure that electricity group entities are properly plugged into the electric network.
- Check the status of electricity group entities to ensure they are working correctly.

### Errors when using transport belt system entities
- Ensure that transport belt system entities are properly connected to the belt group.
- Check the status of transport belt system entities to ensure they are working correctly.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables have been assigned or invoked in the given execution logs.
